Benjamin Rosado

Hi, I'm Ben

I am a Software Engineer from DC. Lover of all things programming. Lately I have been writing a lot of TypeScript, JSON and Makefile.

I work @ American Systems where I spend most of my time building tools for live streamers. Some projects I've worked on include:

  • A tool for automatically capturing highlights in livestreams
  • A platform for running influencer campaigns
  • Dozens of systems for tracking social media performance
